titles.title: May All Who Come Behind Us Find Us Faithful

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
May all who come behind us find us faithful.
May the fire of our devotion light their way.
May the footprints that we leave
Lead them to believe,
And the lives we live inspire them to obey.
May all who come behind us find us faithful.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're pilgrims on the journey
Of the narrow road.
And those who've gone before us line the way.
Cheering on the faithful, encouraging the weary,
Their lives a stirring testament to God's sustaining grace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses,
Let us run the race not only for the prize.
But as those who've gone before us,
Let us leave to those behind us
The heritage of faithfulness passed on through godly lives.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
After all our hopes and dreams have come and gone,
And our children sift through all we've left behind.
May the clues that they discover and the memories they uncover
Become the light that leads them to the road we each must find.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Peregrinos somos por este camino
y los que nos preceden, nos lo muestran
animando a los fieles, alentando a los cansados
sus vidas testimonio vivo por la gracia de Dios.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Oh! que nuestro Dios nos encuentre fieles
y que el fuego de nuestra entrega de luz.
Que las huellas que dejemos induzcan a creer,
que nuestras vidas inspiren obedecer.
Oh! que nuestro Dios, nos encuentre fieles.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Rodeados por tan grande nube de testigos,
corramos para conseguir el premio.
Como aquellos que nos preceden
sigamos con los que vienen,
a la heredad de fidelidad que nos mostraron ya.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Poniendo nuestros ojos en nuestro Señor,
considerando a él que así sufrió.
Que nuestro ánimo no desmaye
y nuestra fe no se apague,
despojándonos de todo peso de pecado ya.
